keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations

byline.contributor: Prashant S. Rao contributed reporting from London and Amie Tsang from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: After plunging in Asia, prices recovered somewhat in Europe, as traders weighed the breakdown of a summit meeting against an energy strike in Kuwait.

headline.print_headline: Uncertainty  Back for Oil; Saudi Hints at Price War
headline.main: Volatility Returns to Oil Market After OPEC Deal Fails

snippet: After plunging in Asia, prices recovered somewhat in Europe, as traders weighed the breakdown of a summit meeting against an energy strike in Kuwait.
abstract: Oil market faces uncertainty as OPEC fails to agree on output freeze at meeting in Doha, Qatar; outlook appears exceedingly bumpy, with glut of oil flooding worldwide markets; Saudi Arabia hints at price war.
